abstract: From Bits: Cisco Systems, which has been expanding its workplace collaboration tools, has ponied up in the most recent round of funding for Xobni, the Microsoft Outlook plug-in for people who are drowning in e-mail.
snippet: From Bits: Cisco Systems, which has been expanding its workplace collaboration tools, has ponied up in the most recent round of funding for Xobni, the Microsoft Outlook plug-in for people who are drowning in e-mail.
lead_paragraph: From Claire Cain Miller at Bits:

headline.main: Cisco Funds Xobni, the Outlook Search Tool
